sentences: Neal X (born Neal Whitmore) was the guitarist with the British band Sigue Sigue Sputnik.
They had a No. 3 UK hit single with "Love Missile F1-11" in 1986.
He has also worked as a sideman for Adam Ant and Marc Almond.
Whitmore founded the Montecristos who released their debut album Born to Rock 'N' Roll in 2015.
He is a member of the band The Loveless, alongside Marc Almond, Iggy Pop's rhythm section Ben Ellis and Mat Hector, and James Beaumont.
